Articles.Content:
> 
> Te-hue-rism : Act of high lvl trolling

You too, [please check out the game rules](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116045-Invent-a-Word%21?p=1847503&viewfull=1#post1847503) ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

(From the last applicable entry)

[poy-oyt-trey-wick-lick-jug-fuds-am-vucks] Noun, a village in Kerbish Scotland.

birbirbini

Birbirbini [ber-ber-BEEN-ee] - noun: Term used by drunk people who are surprised when they see it to describe a bikini.

uhik

[YÃƒâ€¢-EEck] A surname [Very rare: Popularity rank in the U.S.: #10011]

Kuifxa

[koy-fix-ah] Noun, a type of Kerbal offroad vehicle.

yurbenandf
Jaarbahaza [Ja-ar-ba-ha-za] - Exotic food made out of fish and coconuts found close to the island airstrip... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Jaarbahaza [Ja-ar-ba-ha-za] - Exotic food made out of fish and coconuts found close to the island airstrip... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

One more time: [please check out the game rules.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116045-Invent-a-Word%21?p=1847503&viewfull=1#post1847503)

(I'll let the next poster pick the game back up)

yurbenandf

[Hurr-been-und-eff] Verb. A violent explosion of anger typically targeted at a gamer.

Nehhojemso
Nehhojemso [NEH-hoe-JEM-so] - adjective: Sort of like so-so, except not really, although perhaps maybe a little. woiie

[woah-ee] Exclaimation, used when touching something unexpectedly hot or painful, such as being bitten by a burning fire ant.

uermvnasd

[eermvnAsd] the feeling of disappointment when your new game dosnt work perfectly ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Popoasderr

[PÃƒâ€¢e-pÃƒâ€¢e-aced-ehr] Noun. An ancient delicacy made from a blending of cocoa beans, lettuce, and potatoes.

Seseuroud

se-se-yur-ound:noun; a type of hamburger bun.

jbgruheakjhgiuyfjsyhdfbdoagpuhfhbispilzsnfd

[jib-grew-heak-jug-oy-fidge-soyd-fub-do-ah-gupp-puh-fub-is-peel-zis-nuf-duh] The sound made when slowly dying from a bad scent.

uridmvmvfd

[oo-rid-miv-vim-vefed] A condition that causes the voicebox to stop functioning properly. Can be a side effect of a genetic defect, pneumonia, or trying to pronounce uridmvmvfd.

Just to torture the next poster...

arsdcewqrsdqesqesdqraewqrdwasqdrsdqfrwseqrsdqrwsqarsdwqcmjdobvukbvwshdcjkalcndeuowhnudbvyrfuvguwhdcnsouxndsjchywgvffw46tr86w4i784wgyuhibvswuidhsviuhfdvsdl;vjdslvhsiulvhuisvg

> 
> [oo-rid-miv-vim-vefed] A condition that causes the voicebox to stop functioning properly. Can be a side effect of a genetic defect, pneumonia, or trying to pronounce uridmvmvfd.
> Just to torture the next poster...
> 
> arsdcewqrsdqesqesdqraewqrdwasqdrsdqfrwseqrsdqrwsqarsdwqcmjdobvukbvwshdcjkalcndeuowhnudbvyrfuvguwhdcnsouxndsjchywgvffw46tr86w4i784wgyuhibvswuidhsviuhfdvsdl;vjdslvhsiulvhuisvg

Ah.... Please pick a smaller series of letters. In fact, I'm updating the rules, thanks ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

EDIT:

> 
> **Rules:**
> 
> 1. Follow all forum rules!
> 
> 2. No using pre-made words of any language.
> 
> 3. Use a series of letters with a MAXIMUM of about 30 characters, please.
> 
> 4. Have fun!

To get things rolling again: **udgnbbmmb**

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-29T14:50:37Z" title="04/29/2015 02:50  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 29, 2015</time> by Maximus97**

[udgeh-enbuh-em-em-beh] Whenever you say "ugh" but end up coughing.

Jubeifhsk

i do wonder when you will learn "to tound"

to tound: the ability to listen to the music with only a hand (for exemple) in front more or less away of the speaker (no need for ears or else)

oh yeah it's out of the standard rules, but somehow i don't care *\*.doc* also *notice* you may apply the same concept arranged and combined at least 5 times : )

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-29T15:42:50Z" title="04/29/2015 03:42  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 29, 2015</time> by WinkAllKerb''**
  
tks Max ;) for correcting my pat'holo'gic wrongness i know i could count on you for that ; )

> 
> oh yeah it's out of the standard rules' date=' ... [i']\*.doc also *notice* you may apply the same concept arranged and combined at least 5 times : )

If it doesn't follow the rules, the least you can do is attempt to follow them.

[joob-eef-hisk] Norse surname.

ertuuperpil

[err-too-purple] And exclamatory word used when something is just too darn purple. ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

dyenndifj

dye-n-dif-ij verb. to dye your spacesuit with acid. without gloves

haiuhyoiufdshg

[high-uh-yoyf-dush-guh] Expression, a phrase used when looking down at a tremendous fall and becoming intensely afraid.

uurtegdbvnmvmv

[oor-tag-de-bevin-move-move] Sentence, orc language. Directly translates to "Fast running spoon full of ooze". Rarely used.

nvusueow

[Neigh-vOo-sue-oh] Sigma origins. Translates to "Guillotine plant"

Wiaccekad

[wee-ack-e-kad] Onomatopoeia, similar to "whack" but with more pronunciations. "lets play some wiaccekad a kerbal!"

dirhbfujdcbnds

[der-hoob-fudge-duck-bunds] Noun, a type of food used to feed ducks and other types of fowl.

utnbbbdgdgkk
